doctor.name: Dr. Md. Habibul Haque Habib
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Habibul Haque Habib is a Medicine Specialist and Medicine Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine), MD (Gastroenterology), CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Resident Physician, Department of Medicine at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shafique Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Habibul Haque Habib at Shafique Hospital, Pabna is 4pm to 10pm (Thu) & 9am to 4pm (Fri).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Golam Sarwar
doctor.degree: MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine, FP), MD (Gastroenterology, P2)
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Golam Sarwar is a Medicine Specialist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), FCPS (Medicine, FP), MD (Gastroenterology, P2). He is a Assistant Registrar, Department of Medicine at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Dr. Gaffar Diagnostic Complex, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Golam Sarwar at Dr. Gaffar Diagnostic Complex, Pabna is 2pm to 4pm (Everyday).

doctor.name: Dr. D.M. Shahinuzzaman
doctor.specialty: Gastroenterology (Stomach, Intestine, Rectum, Pancreas, Liver) Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. D.M. Shahinuzzaman is a Gastroenterologist in Pabna. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MD (Gastroenterology). He is a Consultant (Gastroenterology) at Rajshahi Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Shafique Hospital, Pabna. Practicing hour of Dr. D.M. Shahinuzzaman at Shafique Hospital, Pabna is 3pm to 9pm (Every Wednesday).
